remove-user
***********


Description
===========

Removes a user from a group.


Usage
=====

   oci iam group remove-user [OPTIONS]


Options
=======


--compartment-id, -c [text]
---------------------------

The OCID of the compartment (remember that the tenancy is simply the
root compartment). If not provided, this parameter will use the
tenancy from the config file.


--user-id [text]
----------------

The OCID of the user. [required]


--group-id [text]
-----------------

The OCID of the group. [required]


--force
-------

Perform removal without prompting for confirmation.


--from-json [text]
------------------

Provide input to this command as a JSON document from a file.

Options can still be provided on the command line. If an option exists
in both the JSON document and the command line then the command line
specified value will be used


-?, -h, --help
--------------

For detailed help on any of these individual commands, enter <command>
--help.
